Research Interests

Network optimization, network resource allocation, load balancing, congestion control, content distribution networks, peer-to-peer networks, software-defined networks, stochastic modelling and performance evaluation of network systems, wireless and sensor networks power control and energy optimization, and cloud computing.

University of Florida, Gainesville, FL USA
